DColorMixer/GetAlphaBar.description: Return true if alpha bar is shown, false if not.

DColorMixer/GetPalette.description: Return true if palette is shown, false if not.

DColorMixer/GetWangs.description: Return true if the wangs are shown, false if not.

DColorMixer/SetAlphaBar.description: Show/Hide the alpha bar in DColorMixer

DColorMixer/SetPalette.description: Show or hide the palette panel

DColorMixer/SetWangs.description: Show / Hide the colors indicators in DColorMixer
